People who wanted to transact in Bitcoin were doing it for ideological reasons. Ripple doesn’t encompass those ideologies.

Ripple used to have a wallet but they shut it down after the FinCEN fine. But that’s not the point I was trying to make. These things should be happening outside of Ripple and they aren’t (for the most part). It’s been years now. I think that ship has sailed.
